sections.title: When this fits and what else to consider
sections.body: This directory is designed to help you navigate treatment options without feeling overwhelmed. Some care is preventative and routine, while other treatments are restorative, cosmetic or more complex. If you’re unsure where to start, a general dental assessment is usually the best first step, as it allows us to check gum health, tooth structure, bite and any symptoms before recommending next steps. From there, we can discuss options in a measured way — what is appropriate now, what can wait, and what alternatives exist — so choices are based on diagnosis and long-term maintainability rather than guesswork.
bullets: Appropriate when you want to navigate treatment categories to reach the most relevant service.
